translations: 持续（persist 的过去分词）；坚持不懈

sentences.sentence: "But, if you wanted to make a flower garden," persisted Mary, "what would you plant?"
sentences.translation: “但是，如果你打算建一个种花的院子，” 玛丽坚持道，“你会种什么呢?”

sentences.sentence: Scientists who persisted in research without receiving a grant made greater achieve we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s than those who got one with luck, as suggested in one study.
sentences.translation: 一项研究表明，在没有得到资助的情况下坚持研究的科学家比那些幸运地得到资助的科学家取得了更大的成就。
